Package sorcer.core.provider.logger

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LogFileHandler  
    LogFilter  
    LoggingConfig
    Stores the name of a logger and the Level of that logger.
    RemoteHandler
    This class gets a proxy to the Logger and forwards the LogRecord to the logger.
